class.name: EReportingSamplingPointEntity
class.comment: Table to store the AQD e-Reporting Sampling Point information. Mapping file: mapping/ereporting/EReportingSamplingPoint.hbm.xml

column.name: id
column.comment: Table primary key, used for relations

column.name: domainId
column.comment: The identifier of the samplingPoint, gml:identifier. Used as parameter for queries. Optional but unique

column.name: codespace
column.comment: Relation/foreign key to the codespace table. Contains the gml:identifier codespace. Optional

column.name: name
column.comment: The name of the samplingPoint, gml:name. Optional

column.name: codespaceName
column.comment: Relation/foreign key to the codespace table. Contains the gml:name codespace. Optional

column.name: description
column.comment: Description of the samplingPoint, gml:description. Optional

column.name: assessmentType
column.comment: Relation/foreign key to the assessmentType table. Describes the type of the assessmentType. Contains "assessmentType".assessmentType

column.name: station
column.comment: Relation/foreign key to the station table. Describes the type of the station. Contains "station".stationId

column.name: network
column.comment: Relation/foreign key to the network table. Describes the type of the network. Contains "network".networkId
